com.simsilica.es

Interface ObservableEntityData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEntityData, SqlEntityData

    public interface ObservableEntityData
extends EntityData
    Represents a specialization of EntityData the can report changes about the entities it manages. This is useful for server-side dispatch of relevant changes to other remote clients.
